sentences.en: British industry suffers through insufficient investment in research.
sentences.cn: 研究投入不足让英国工业深受其害。

sentences.en: Distance alone is insufficient to specify all properties at space.
sentences.cn: 单靠距离还不足以把空间的所有性质说清楚.

sentences.en: Frequently insufficient feathers are available for the development of the framework branches.
sentences.cn: 常常有这样的情况,即用来培养骨干枝的分枝数量不够.

sentences.en: He decided there was insufficient evidence to justify criminal proceedings.
sentences.cn: 他认定证据不充分无法提起刑事诉讼。

sentences.en: He was reprimanded for insufficient control.
sentences.cn: 他因管理不善受到了责备.

sentences.en: He was tired because he had had insufficient sleep.
sentences.cn: 他很疲倦,因为他未睡足.

sentences.en: His children were dwarfed by insufficient food.
sentences.cn: 他的儿女因营养不良而发育不全.

sentences.en: His salary is insufficient to meet his needs.
sentences.cn: 他的薪水不够应付需要。

sentences.en: In diabetes the body produces insufficient insulin.
sentences.cn: 糖尿病患者体内不能分泌足够的胰岛素。

sentences.en: Insufficient resources have been devoted to the health service.
sentences.cn: 用于医疗保健服务的资源不足。

sentences.en: Our school has been reprieved from insufficient financial resources.
sentences.cn: 我们学校财力不足的困境现已暂时得到缓解。

sentences.en: So, initially as you looked at it it was associated with insufficient coolant.
sentences.cn: 所以，最初你们观察它时，它是与,不足的冷却剂有关。

sentences.en: Some people like to track everything, and we do imagine that it could be helpful to see longer periods of poor or insufficient sleep than we realized we were experiencing.
sentences.cn: 有些人喜欢追踪记录所有的事情，我们可以想象，了解我们睡眠不足或睡眠质量差的时间比我们意识到的长，会对我们有帮助。

sentences.en: The case was thrown out of court because of insufficient evidence.
sentences.cn: 由于证据不足,法庭对此案不予受理.

sentences.en: The evidence against him was weak and insufficient.
sentences.cn: 指控他的证据不足且无说服力。

sentences.en: The food was both bad and insufficient.
The unit has insufficient armament with which to do battle.
sentences.cn: 这个分队缺少作战的武器装备.

sentences.en: The worshiper thinks that the worst is the insufficient horsepower.
sentences.cn: 崇拜者认为最坏的事是马力不足.

sentences.en: These efforts were insufficient to contain the burgeoning crisis.
sentences.cn: 这些努力不足以抑制迅速扩散的危机。

words.tran_cn: 不足，不充分；机能不全；不适当

trans.tran_cn: 不足的，不够的，绌，亏短，支绌
trans.tran_en: not enough, or not great enough
